Text: Thanks so much for these Epic titles! It's a great thing you do. Marvel's Epic stuff is some decent, hard to find online material. I would say Comico and First! Comics in the 80s are similar in interestingness and rarity.

You're welcome Comixscholar! I've spent the last three weeks chasing down obscure CMC torrents to piece these together. Once I saw how hard it was, I decided to upload these in hopes of saturating the torrent-sphere and keeping them available for years to come. Needless to say, MORE TO COME!
